Attached is the Special Investigation Report for the above referenced facility. Due to the
violations identified in the report, a written corrective action plan is required. The
corrective action plan is due 15 days from the date of this letter and must include the
following:
 How compliance with each rule will be achieved.
 Who is directly responsible for implementing the corrective action for each
violation.
 Specific time frames for each violation as to when the correction will be
completed or implemented.
 How continuing compliance will be maintained once compliance is
achieved.
 The signature of the responsible party and a date.
If you desire technical assistance in addressing these issues, please feel free to contact
me. In any event, the corrective action plan is due within 15 days. Failure to submit an

Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone

ALLEGATION 1:
Around 5/14/22, staff member allowed two youth to have sexual intercourse while
this staff and other youth watched.
INVESTIGATION:
A complaint was received on 6/3/22 alleging Staff 1 allowed Youth A and Youth B to
have sexual intercourse while Staff 1 and other youth at the facility watched. This
occurred around 5/14/22.
Interviews:
Supervisor was interviewed face to face at the facility on 6/7/22 along with the DHHS
Worker. He reported when he was informing parents of the boys losing their
weekend home passes due to vaping, Youth B’s mother reported two youth were
having sex while at the facility. When Supervisor questioned Youth G, he confirmed
Youth A and Youth B had sex at the facility. Supervisor stated he then reviewed
video of Staff 1’s shifts and created a list of what he saw.
Supervisor further stated there is nothing in writing about the expectations for staff,
but they go over it verbally during training. They talk about being friendly but still in
charge of the youth, common sense dress code, and keeping boys and girls
3

separated. They try to keep male staff with the boys and female staff with the girls,
but it is not always possible. Female staff are not allowed to be one on one with
male youth. There is also no physical contact allowed at the facility.
The complainant was interviewed on 6/7/22. He did not have any additional
information to add.
Youth C was interviewed face to face at the facility on 6/7/22 along with the DHHS
Worker. Youth C reported that while he and Staff 1 were in the bathroom off the
counseling room, Youth A and Youth B were having sex on the couch in the
counseling room. Youth C said him and Staff 1 were in the bathroom kissing. Youth
C and Staff 1 were able to see Youth A and Youth B on the couch together when
they walked out of the bathroom. Youth C said that he and Staff 1 walked out of
counseling room to go check on brownies that were cooking in the kitchen. They
then went back to the counseling room to get Youth A and Youth B to go back
downstairs with them. Staff 2 was also working and was in the basement when they
were in the counseling room upstairs. They told Staff 2 they were going up to make
brownies. Youth C reported it was Youth A and Youth B's idea to go in the
counseling room. Youth C said that when the four of them got into the counseling
room him and Staff 1 went into the bathroom. Youth A and Youth B had sex at the
facility about 3 or 4 times per Youth C. Two of the times he knows Staff 1 was there.
Youth A and Youth B also had sex downstairs in the basement. He does not
remember who all was present, but he did remember Staff 1 was sitting next to him
in the chairs facing the TV. Youth A and Youth B were in the corner by the TV. He
was not sure if Staff 1 could see past him to where Youth A and Youth B were. The
two were slouched down pretty far so they could not be seen. He could see Youth A
on Youth B's lap bouncing. Both of them had clothes on.
Youth A's mother was interviewed face to face at the courthouse on 6/7/22. She
stated her daughter told her what happened at the youth home. Youth A told her
mother she had sex with Youth B three times while at the youth home and Staff 1
had given Youth A a pregnancy test that was negative.
Youth A was interviewed face to face at the courthouse along with the DHHS Worker
on 6/7/22. Youth A reported she had sex with Youth B in the basement at the facility
and that Staff 1 and other youth were there when it happened. Youth A said that
Staff 1 was watching TV while she and Youth B were over by the couches. She said
it occurred on a Saturday. The other staff was upstairs at the time because some of
the youths were taking showers. The other time they had sex was also in the
basement when Staff 1 was downstairs watching TV. Staff 1 knew what they were
doing, and Youth A said Staff 1 was "right there." Youth A said she did not go into
the counseling room with Youth B. The only times she went into the room was when
staff had to go to the bathroom. One time was with Staff 1, but it was just the two of
them.

A virtual interview was set up with Youth B. The interview was conducted by the
